com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.annotation

Class LineManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.annotation.LineManager

  • public class LineManager
extends Object
    The line manager allows to add lines to a map.

                   GeoJsonSource geoJsonSource,

        Create a line manager, used to manage lines.
        Parameters:
        mapboxMap - the map object to add lines to
        geoJsonSource - the geojson source to add lines to
        layer - the line layer to visualise Lines with
